articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: Someone modded a Game Boy Color to act as a much better Apple TV remote - Circuit Breaker
articles.description: A tinkerer has created a Game Boy Color game cartridge that allows it to be used as an Apple TV remote. Why? Because it’s awesome, and the current Apple TV remote is not.
articles.content:
Filed under:
It does two things the Apple TV remote doesnt: work well and play Mario Tennis
